Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation

Class AbstractSimulationUnit

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.AbstractSimulationUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationModuleOwner, OperatingSystem, EventProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentUnit, ChargingStationUnit, RoadSideUnit, ServerUnit, TrafficLightGroupUnit, VehicleUnit
public abstract class AbstractSimulationUnit extends Object implements EventProcessor, OperatingSystem, CommunicationModuleOwner
This class is to be extended by all units that can be equipped with applications. It supplies all functionality for loading applications, communication with the RTI and the processing of events, etc.

    • preProcessEvent

      public final boolean preProcessEvent(Event event)
      This method processes an event, before the extension of the simulation unit should process an event. Important: This method should always be called before. It is used to process certain events that are executed in all units equivalent.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to process.
      Returns:
      true if this method has processed the given event
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if Event could not be properly handled by the processor
